statements: SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases;
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT item_purchased, purchase_amount FROM in_app_purchases WHERE player_id = 12345 ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date, item_purchased FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_amount < 50.00;
SELECT player_id, purchase_date FROM in_app_purchases WHERE item_purchased LIKE '%gems%';
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases WHERE player_id = 123 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT player_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_amount FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_amount > 100;
SELECT item_purchased, COUNT(*) AS purchase_count FROM in_app_purchases GROUP BY item_purchased ORDER BY purchase_count DESC;
SELECT player_id, AVG(purchase_amount) AS avg_amount FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchases WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY purchase_amount ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_purchases
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount FROM player_purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC
SELECT player_id, player_name, last_login FROM player_accounts WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01'
SELECT SUM(total_purchases) AS total_purchases_sum FROM player_accounts
SELECT player_id, purchase_date FROM player_purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100
SELECT player_name, last_login FROM player_accounts WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM player_purchases ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, purchase_amount FROM player_accounts INNER JOIN player_purchases ON player_accounts.player_id = player_purchases.player_id;
SELECT player_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS num_purchases FROM player_purchases GROUP BY player_id HAVING num_purchases > 5;
SELECT player_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM player_accounts LEFT JOIN player_purchases ON player_accounts.player_id = player_purchases.player_id WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player ORDER BY player_level DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, item_quantity FROM player_inventory JOIN player ON player_inventory.player_id = player.player_id;
SELECT * FROM in_app_purchase WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT player.player_name, in_app_purchase.purchase_amount FROM player JOIN in_app_purchase ON player.player_id = in_app_purchase.player_id ORDER BY in_app_purchase.purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM in_app_purchase WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT player_id, item_name, item_quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE item_quantity < 10 ORDER BY item_quantity DESC, player_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, coins FROM player WHERE coins > 1000;
SELECT game_id, game_name FROM game ORDER BY game_name DESC;

SELECT p.player_id, g.game_name, i.coins FROM player p INNER JOIN purchase pu ON p.player_id = pu.player_id INNER JOIN game g ON pu.game_id = g.game_id LEFT JOIN inventory i ON p.player_id = i.player_id;
SELECT player_name, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM player p INNER JOIN purchase pu ON p.player_id = pu.player_id GROUP BY player_name HAVING total_spent > 50;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player WHERE coins > 100 ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT game_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM game JOIN purchase ON game.game_id = purchase.game_id GROUP BY game_name HAVING total_amount > 500;

SELECT player.player_name, game.game_name, purchase.amount FROM player JOIN purchase ON player.player_id = purchase.player_id JOIN game ON purchase.game_id = game.game_id WHERE player.coins >= 100 ORDER BY purchase.amount DESC;
SELECT player.player_name, inventory.coins FROM player LEFT JOIN inventory ON player.player_id = inventory.player_id ORDER BY player.player_name;

SELECT player.player_name, COALESCE(SUM(amount), 0) AS total_amount FROM player LEFT JOIN purchase ON player.player_id = purchase.player_id GROUP BY player.player_name HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM Player
SELECT purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM InAppPurchase
SELECT total_games_played, total_wins, total_losses FROM PlayerStats
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM InventoryItems
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM PaymentHistory
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM Player WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_name DESC
SELECT player_name, total_wins, total_losses, total_games_played FROM PlayerStats JOIN Player ON PlayerStats.player_id = Player.player_id ORDER BY total_wins DESC
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_description FROM InventoryItems WHERE item_type = 'Weapon' ORDER BY item_name
SELECT player_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM InAppPurchase WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT player_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM PaymentHistory JOIN Player ON PaymentHistory.player_id = Player.player_id WHERE payment_amount >= 50 ORDER BY payment_date
